meta.name: USRBG
meta.tagline: Displays user banners from USRBG, allowing anyone to get a banner without Nitro
meta.description:
[CLICK HERE TO GET YOUR OWN BANNER](https://github.com/AutumnVN/usrbg#how-to-request-your-own-usrbg-banner)

Ported from [this Vencord plugin](https://github.com/Vendicated/Vencord/tree/main/src/plugins/usrbg)

nitroFirst.description: If both Nitro and USRBG backgrounds are present, use the Nitro background
